item.description:
You may still come even if you missed the first several meetings. You may want to read the first seven chapters so you can get caught up.  

Meet for dinner first at ﻿5:30 pm - in the cafe
dinner available for purchase at the Cafe - sorry no food allowed from the outside

﻿6:15 pm - 7:45 pm Reading and Insights - in the event room back of store

Spiritual Book Club for Enhancing our Lives  

The purpose of this book club is to read from life-changing books that help to gain insight on ourselves, our relationships and spirituality. These books that have been chosen are designed to give you a new perspective and live a happier more fulfilling life.   

Unlike other book clubs, we read the book together, one or more chapters at a time (no need to read ahead of time unless you miss a meeting).  We then share our insights and perspectives on what was read.  

You can buy the books on your own or get them out of the library.  I have a few copies of our first book (A Return to Love) available for $7 each.

We will read one book at a time which could take several months. Once that book is completed, we will move on to the next one from the list below:

  1. A Return to Love - by Marianne Williamson reading now
  2. Your Best Life Now - by Joel Osteen
  3. Listen - by Lynne Robinson - discovering and enhacing your intuition

Check out the reviews on Amazon to learn more about these books.

This book club will meet every Tuesday starting December 6 except for two weeks where we will meet Mondays: January 16 and January 23.

﻿5:30 pm - 6:15 pm Dinner and Socialize

dinner available for purchase at the Cafe - no food allowed from the outside

﻿6:15 pm - 7:45 pm Reading and Insights - in the event room back of store

Store closes at 9:00 pm so there is plenty of time to browse the store!

To get the most out of this book club, it is recommended you try to attend every meeting. 

No charge for this event.
item.name: Spiritual Book Club
